column1: 4.1 - DEFAULT AXIS UNIT AND TRENDLINE LABEL POSITIONS (red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = labels, yellow = label space)
2D scatter chart (unit labels and trendline labels)
column5: 2D scatter chart, secondary axes set (unit labels)
column9: 3D bar chart (unit labels, no trendlines in 3D charts)

column1: 4.2 - MANUAL AXIS UNIT AND TRENDLINE LABEL POSITIONS (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, green = labels)
2D scatter chart (unit labels and trendline labels)
column5: 2D scatter chart, secondary axes set (unit labels)
